### Checklist

<!-- Ensure all items are completed before requesting review -->

#### Code Quality

- [ ] My code follows the project's style guidelines
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my code
- [ ] I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas
- [ ] My code is properly typed (TypeScript)
- [ ] No TypeScript errors or warnings
- [ ] No ESLint errors or warnings
- [ ] Code is formatted with Prettier

#### Testing

- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix is effective or that my feature works
- [ ] New and existing unit tests pass locally
- [ ] I have tested edge cases and error scenarios

#### Documentation

- [ ] I have updated the documentation accordingly
- [ ] I have added/updated JSDoc comments for new functions
- [ ] I have updated the README if needed
- [ ] I have updated CONTRIBUTING.md if needed
- [ ] API documentation is updated (if applicable)

#### Database Changes

- [ ] Database migrations are included (if applicable)
- [ ] Migrations are tested and reversible
- [ ] Seed data is updated (if applicable)

#### Security

- [ ] No sensitive information (API keys, passwords) is hardcoded
- [ ] Environment variables are documented in .env.example
- [ ] Security best practices are followed
- [ ] Input validation is implemented
- [ ] SQL injection prevention is in place

#### Performance

- [ ] No performance regressions introduced
- [ ] Database queries are optimized
- [ ] No N+1 query problems
- [ ] Large data sets are handled efficiently

#### Dependencies

- [ ] No unnecessary dependencies added
- [ ] All dependencies are up to date
- [ ] Dependencies are audited for security vulnerabilities
- [ ] package.json and package-lock.json are in sync
